bug.author: gabrielwen
bug.summary: healthy check URI is / instead of /healthz

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.82. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apps/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/gabrielwen>@gabrielwen</denchmark-link> Can you provide more context? Is this one of our CI clusters? How was this error produced?

We have a job to update the healthcheck path to /healthz: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/blob/master/kubeflow/gcp/update_backend.sh#L38>https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/blob/master/kubeflow/gcp/update_backend.sh#L38</denchmark-link>
And our Istio setup is assuming it's /healthz for routing and also jwt check excludes that. However, it seems that although that job finished without error, the health check path is still /
